title: Graham Brady – 2022 Statement Confirming Vote of No Confidence in Boris Johnson
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Graham Brady, the chair of the 1922 Committee, on 6 June 2022.
content: The threshold of 15% of the parliamentary party seeking a vote of confidence in the leader of the Conservative Party has been exceeded.

In accordance with the rules, a ballot will be held between 1800 and 2000 on Monday 6 June, details to be confirmed. The votes will be counted immediately afterwards. An announcement will be made at a time to be advised. Arrangements for the announcement will be released later today.
